name: Dead Island: Riptide Definitive Edition
description: Welcome to the zombie apocalypse experience of a lifetime – more beautiful than ever. Caught in an epic zombie outbreak on the tropical island of Banoi, your only thought is: Survive!

reviews.review_text: a buddy and i , completed it. experienced both heavy sound bugs through half the game. my friend got his savegame toasted at the end of chapter 7, so we had to find a workaround....  very very disapointing for a DEFINITIV edition.... SHAME.... SHAME..... SHAME

The knifethrowing zombies absolutely ruins this game! I have every health upgrade available they still kill me with one throw! The zombies respawn way too fast and way too close! I whipe out a small area only to find that they respawned on the exact same spots as i were minutes ago just killed them. Respawning enemies can be one of the worst things in games in my opinion. Its frustrating and pointless! Respawing enemies is OK only if it doesnt happen too frequently and only if the enemies becomes slimmed down, this is important so that i can feel some sort of accomplishment. If not, killing zombies will feel absolutely pointless! Sometimes the zombies will spawn right in front of your face and that NEVER happened in Dead Island! You save a guy from a horde of zombies and the next time you walk by the same zombies are there trying to grab the guy you saved even though the guy is gone... im like wtf is this? The zombies will be on to you and follow you even though you drive by in high speed, so every time i step out of the car i must fight stragglers, every single time and that gets tiresome so damn fast! Those who hasnt mastered the combat will have a frustrating experience since fast zombies will pop out of every bush on the island and this game makes you realise how bad the combat really is! The zombies are too freaking crowded in this game! I like dead island but this game is boring compared to the first one! Its prettier but no matter how much you pollish a turd it will still be a turd!
The gameplay is like being stuck in quicksand. Very choppy. It looks good but what's the point if you can't play the game? I love Riptide and haven't been able to enjoy it. 6/10
The graphic is fine,the change is obvious,the price is good,but it still have some BUGs need to solve,and the story is the same sa before,there is no something new.8/10

Great game and amazing remastered graphics with open world also many side mission. I definitely recommend this game especially if you are a fan of zombies or dying light.( you can use xbox one controller!!!)  10/10
I like it a lot! Had a lot of fun playing co-op with my gaming friend =)
A redux worth getting, well done.

game runs like butter when using dimmdrive. 60fps solid with max settings and vsync on. not sure what people are talking about with it being buggy and laggy. i play just fine on my mid lvl gaming pc with only a HD 7950 boost gpu. maybe it's just dimmdrive that is making a huge difference for me idk. game loads in seconds, and plays flawless in the short time i spent on it so far. and i have the same performance with DIDE. 60fps solid

Problem  - Boring story and boring characters - Boring fetch quests - No varation in enemies  - Exact same combat over and over - Before you are even 1/3 into the game you will be almost maxed out (not that it makes a diffrence) - Skills themselves don't change gameplay - Weapons all operate the same  The Good  - It looks fantastic and runs great - Fairly large world  PC problems  - No hotkeys (bad port) - V-sync oblitorates framerate (bad port) - No FOV optiion with default set to 60 (bad port)  Overall - fun for a few hours or shorts bursts but ultimately it gets old well before you get close to finishing

Yup, I got what I was afraid of. Polite warning: I can't help but compare this to Dying Light, so bear with me (no, we're not going to eat raw salmon, not right now).  It's still pretty clumsy in terms of gameplay. I mean, they haven't even touched the fighting system; compared to DL, it feels stale and very repetitive.   Pretty much all the characters featured are forgettable. In DL, every person had a ♥♥♥♥ing personality. Dead Island is full of dull people with horrible voice-acting.  BUTT ( YES, a wild butt appears)!!!  It is still pretty enjoyable. There is something very relaxing about this game, and I think I'm going to give it a chance,  tl;dr - You played Dead Island games and liked them, but want better graphics? Buy Definitive Edition.  You played DI and found it bad? Forget this game.  You didn'y play DI games but want to give them a whirl? That's the moment, don't be shy.
NOT FOR LAPTOPS  I have a msi ge72... it is supposed to run fine, but i get 14fps.
